CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-1-TEXT: Normal damage and 1d2 %ABILITY-CON=Con% and %ABILITY-STR=Str% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction%. Hand useless %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-2-TEXT: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-CONFUSED=confused% for 1d3 rounds (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Con saving throw negates%).
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-3-TEXT: Double damage and target is %STATUS-DEAFENED=deafened% for 1d4 rounds.
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-4-TEXT: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-BLINDED=blinded% for 1d3 rounds.
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-5-TEXT: Normal damage and target cannot breathe or speak. DC 13 Medicine check ends the condition.
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-6-TEXT: Double damage and the target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%.
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-7-TEXT: Double damage and target has 1 item disarmed.
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-8-TEXT: Double damage and one free attack against the target with disadvantage.
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-11-TEXT: Normal damage and 1d4 %ABILITY-CON=Con% and %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction%. Target's speeds are reduced by half %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-12-TEXT: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-RESTRAINED=restrained% for 1 round.
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-13-TEXT: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-STUNNED=stunned% for 1 round.
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-14-TEXT: Double damage and the target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage% (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Con saving throw negates%).
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-15-TEXT: Double damage and target is %STATUS-POISONED=poisoned% for 1 round (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Con saving throw negates%).
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-16-TEXT: Double damage and 2d6 %OBJECT-DAMAGE=damage to metal armor%.
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-17-TEXT: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 2 stages% for 1d4 rounds.
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-18-TEXT: Normal damage and the target is %STATUS-INCAPACITATED=incapacitated% and %STATUS-BLINDED=blinded% for 1 round.
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-19-TEXT: Double damage plus target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%.
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-21-TEXT: Normal damage and the target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 2 stages%.
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-23-TEXT: Double damage and target is knocked %STATUS-PRONE=prone%.
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-24-TEXT: Normal damage and the target is %STATUS-INCAPACITATED=incapacitated% for 1d3 rounds (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Con saving throw negates% each round).
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-25-TEXT: Double damage and 1 %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction% and target's speeds are reduced by 5 feet %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-26-TEXT: Double damage and 2d6 %ABILITY-INT=Int% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction% that only be healed with Greater Restoration (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Con saving throw halves%).
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-27-TEXT: Normal damage and target is knocked %STATUS-PRONE=prone% and %STATUS-STUNNED=stunned% for 1 round (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Str saving throw negates% stun).
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-28-TEXT: Normal damage and either 1d3 %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction% and halve speed (leg) or 1d3 %ABILITY-STR=Str% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction% (arm). Limb useless %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-29-TEXT: Double damage to target and normal damage to one adjacent target.
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-30-TEXT: Normal damage and the target %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 2 stages% (DC 15 Con saving throw negates,).
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-31-TEXT: Normal damage and 1d4 %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction% and target is disarmed (1 item, %SAVE-CRITICAL=Dex saving throw negates% drop).
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-32-TEXT: Normal damage and a free attack against adjacent foes.
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-33-TEXT: Normal damage and the target is %STATUS-INCAPACITATED=incapacitated% for 1 round (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Con saving throw negates%).
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-34-TEXT: Normal damage and 1 %ABILITY-CON=Con% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction%. Target loses bite and until he is healed the next time he casts a verbal spell rolls 1d20: 1-10: the spell is lost. 11-20 the spell is cast.
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-35-TEXT: Normal damage and a free trip attempt versus target and all adjacent enemies.
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-36-TEXT: Normal damage and target %STATUS-INCAPACITATED=incapacitated% for 1d2 rounds.
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-37-TEXT: Normal damage and 1d3 %ABILITY-CON=Con% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction% and target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%.
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-38-TEXT: Normal damage and target %STATUS-DEAFENED=deafened% for 1d4 hours.
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-39-TEXT: Normal damage and 1d2 %ABILITY-INT=Int% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction% and %STATUS-POISONED=poisoned% for 1d4 rounds.
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-40-TEXT: Double damage and +2 on all your attack rolls for 1 round.
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-41-TEXT: Normal damage and 1 %ABILITY-CHA=Cha% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction% and the target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%.
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-42-TEXT: Double damage and target cannot heal naturally for 1d4 days.
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-43-TEXT: Double damage and target is pushed 1d6 × 5 feet directly away.
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-44-TEXT: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-POISONED=poisoned% for 1d6 rounds.
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-45-TEXT: Double damage, the target can't take reactions and can only perform an action or a move in the next round.
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-46-TEXT: Double damage and target's shield is disarmed.
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-47-TEXT: Normal damage and target takes has disadvantage on attacks for 1d4 rounds.
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-48-TEXT: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-UNCONSCIOUS=unconscious% for 1d4 rounds (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Con saving throw negates%).
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-49-TEXT: Normal damage and 1d2 %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction%. Target's base land speed reduced to 10 feet %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-50-TEXT: Double damage and 1d4 hours of target's memory erased.
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-51-TEXT: Normal damage and 1d4 %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction%. Target's land speed is halved %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.
CRITICAL-BLUDGEONING-52-TEXT: Normal damage and target provokes opportunity attacks from all threatening opponents.
